column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Many miles were traveled
column2: many miles were run to surpass the guilt and the cheese that makes Chicago style pizza. The pizza was less mediocre. We ordered the 'butter' crust
column3: definitely a miss. The crust was buttery but didn't hold up well. The sauce was watery and the toppings weren't anything special. The service was great and that scored this pizzeria a couple stars. But the pizza wasn't great
column4: wasn't good was barely OK. Giordano's is worth the wait and the calories
